# urlDecodingState

**Instance Property**

A state that indicates the process of decoding an App Clip Code URL.

## Declaration

```swift
var urlDecodingState: ARAppClipCodeAnchor.URLDecodingState { get }
```

## Discussion

The initial value of this property is [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARAppClipCodeAnchor/URLDecodingState-swift.enum/decoding].

## Decoding the URL

- **url**: The URL encoded in an App Clip Code.
- **ARAppClipCodeAnchor.URLDecodingState**: The states in the process of decoding an App Clip code URL.
